name: Side Lying Hip Abduction
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your side with your legs straight and stacked one on top of the other, feet touching.
2. Lift your top knee away from your bottom knee, keeping both feet flexed.
3. Continue to lift your top knee up and out until it is almost fully extended, keeping your core engaged to maintain stability throughout the movement.
4. Slowly lower your top knee back down to the starting position without letting it touch the bottom knee.
5. Repeat on the other side by switching positions and repeating the process.
short_summary: Side lying hip abduction isolates the muscles of the outer thigh, specifically targeting the glutes.
